sub_title: Director Global Sourcing at Vesper Global Sourcing
summary: I have more then 20 years of solid experience in the Apparel sector from factories to high level of merchandising. Also having experience of working several countries in apparel sector round the world. Accumulate all these years of experience now engaged in high quality apparel manufacturing to serve customers with top quality products through my company “ VESPER GLOBAL SOURCING”. I am also masters in business administration (MBA) major in marketing. So my academic and years of experience helps me to understand buyers current demands. I am very honest about my work and always want to clean with everyone. I only commit what I can do. You are absolutely welcome to have a try with me and my company. You will not regret. It’s a promise. Thank you!
